name: Carlos Aguirre GONZALES, a/k/a Carlos Aguirre, Sr., Appellant, v. Kirsten AGUIRRE, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., note their dissent.
parties: Carlos Aguirre GONZALES, a/k/a Carlos Aguirre, Sr., Appellant, v. Kirsten AGUIRRE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal in the above-captioned case is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, J., note their dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marvin J. Apple, Joel E. Hausman, Apple & Apple, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jon C. Botula, Jon C. Botula & Associates, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
615 A.2d 731
Carlos Aguirre GONZALES, a/k/a Carlos Aguirre, Sr., Appellant, v. Kirsten AGUIRRE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 21, 1992.
Decided Nov. 10, 1992.
Marvin J. Apple, Joel E. Hausman, Apple & Apple, P.C., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Jon C. Botula, Jon C. Botula & Associates, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
